abstract: A rocket company founded by Jeffrey P. Bezos, the Amazon chief executive, announced plans to use a historic launch site at Cape Canaveral.
snippet: A rocket company founded by Jeffrey P. Bezos, the Amazon chief executive, announced plans to use a historic launch site at Cape Canaveral.
lead_paragraph: Blue Origin, a secretive rocket company started by Jeffrey P. Bezos, the chief executive of Amazon, made a splashy public announcement on Tuesday, saying it will build rockets and send them into orbit from Florida.

headline.main: Blue Origin, Jeff Bezos’ Rocket Company, to Launch From Florida
headline.print_headline: Bezos-Run Rocket Firm Will Launch in Florida
